short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to deploy tokens and manage initiation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As a dungeon master, I prefer using online maps and applications to make life easier so that I can focus on the players. I created this extension to assist player movement, conditions, and initiative within Dungeons & Dragons, regardless of the website I used for everything else (like worldbuilding and maps). If you have a favorite map building application but it's missing player tokens, or you just want to use an image file with overlaying tokens, then this extension is for you.
